statements: DELETE FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE month = 5 AND demand < 100;
DELETE FROM MonthlyDemand WHERE demand > 100 AND month < 6;
DELETE FROM monthly_demand WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 4;
DELETE FROM monthly_demand WHERE year = 2020 AND month = 10

DELETE FROM monthly_demand_metrics WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 7;
DELETE FROM monthly_demand_errors WHERE error_code = 'ERR123' OR error_code = 'ERR456';

DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND unit_price > 50;
